description.effect.dungeons_gear.bow_cha: Bow is always fully charged. (only works on dungeons gear)
description.effect.dungeons_gear.dynamo: Increases damage of weapons with the Dynamo enchantment.
description.effect.dungeons_gear.party_s: Melee attacks create an explosion effect.
description.effect.dungeons_gear.soul_pr: Saves you from death. This effect is removed upon reviving.
description.effect.dungeons_gear.stunned: Inflicts nausea and slowness, and cannot attack.
